com.qtfx.lib.gui.action

Class ActionSearchAndRefresh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.action.handlers.ActionEventHandler
      • com.qtfx.lib.gui.action.ValueAction
        • com.qtfx.lib.gui.action.ActionSearchAndRefresh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionSearchAndRefreshDB

    public abstract class ActionSearchAndRefresh
extends ValueAction
    Action to search values to refresh field controls, executed as a value action.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
